title: Lightning Bolt
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|Fires a mighty bolt of lightning. Its damage bypasses half of defender's armour, and it can be bounced off walls to hit targets twice.}} '''Lightning Bolt''' is a monster-only spell which fires a somewhat inaccurate bolt of lightning, similar to [[Shock]]. This bolt can pierce through enemies. If the lightning bolt hits a rock or stone [[wall]], it will bounce back at an angle, potentially striking a target twice. See [[doublezap]] for more information. As a property of BEAM_ELEC damage, it ignores 1/2 of enemy [[AC]]. It also creates a lot of [[noise]] and will set [[tree]]s on fire. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== *Prior to [[0.30]], Lightning Bolt was a level 5 [[Conjurations]]/[[Air Magic]] spell that players could cast. {{Spell |name=Lightning Bolt |level=5 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Air Magic}} |school3= |sources=
